verses.roman:
aṣṭādaśa-varṣa kevala nīlācale sthiti
āpani ācari' jīve śikhāilā bhakti

synonyms: aṣṭādaśa-varṣa—for eighteen years; kevala—only; nīlācale—in Jagannātha Purī; sthiti—staying; āpani—personally; ācari'-behaving; jīve—unto the living entities; śikhāilā—instructed; bhakti—devotional service.
translation: For eighteen continuous years, Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu remained at Jagannātha Purī and, through His personal behavior, instructed all living entities in the mode of devotional service.
